00512 #ifdef MC2_SYSTEM
00513 class LangType {
00514 public:
00515    typedef LangTypes::language_t language_t;
00516 
00518    inline LangType( ) : m_lang ( LangTypes::invalidLanguage ) {}
00519    
00521    inline LangType( LangTypes::language_t lang ) : m_lang(lang) {}
00522 
00524    inline operator language_t() const { return m_lang; }
00525    
00526 private:
00528    language_t m_lang;
00529 };
